dataBaseC

Class Ingredient

  • java.lang.Object
    • dataBaseC.Ingredient

  • public class Ingredient
extends java.lang.Object
    Data structure to hold each ingredient's data. Used by Database C to keep track of inventory. Only have one object for each ingredient to keep memory usage low.
    Author:
    cms549

      • checkThreshold

        public java.lang.Double checkThreshold()
        Gets the difference of the amount left in the invetory and the threshold
        Returns:

        Decrements this ingredient amount by the amount specified
        Parameters:
        amount - to decrement this ingredient by
        Returns:
        the amount left in the inventory on success, null on failure
